name: Animate Tutorial
summary: An ANT file is a tutorial created by Adobe Animate, an application for drawing and publishing interactive animations. It contains one or more recordings of a tutorial, including cursor movements, clicks, and card prompts. ANT files also store the .FLA animation on which the tutorial details, .ANA assets, and an .ANP preferences file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
